constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
SMKCON Name: Borough Wide Smoke Control Order
TPAREA Ref: MAC.05.54Tree ref: A1Tree category: ADetails: M&C Order no: 05 Year: 1954 (note: mislabelled as 1952 previously)

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate that the proposal would not cause harm to trees either on or off site and result in irreversible harm and future loss a number of trees  which are the subject of a tree preservation order. As such the proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 and DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
description: Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 22/03123/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of new dwelling.) to remove basement, revise rear terrace, increase bike storage to form plant room. Erection of 2nos additional single storey rear extension at different corners.
